downloadNoLists: There are no lists to export. Go to My lists to create a list of features.
noNotifications: You have no notification list yet.
selectLayerAndAdd: Use selection tools to choose which features to include and then click Create list.
selectSearchTip: Select features from the input layer to add to your list. Draw with sketch tools, specify a search distance, and use features from another layer to select overlapping features.
selectLayerTip: Draw shapes to select features from the chosen selection layer; the results will be used to select features from the addressee layer
selectSketchTip: Use sketch tools to draw graphics in the map to select intersecting features in the addressee layer.
listHasSetsTip: Edit or delete existing lists or click Create new list.
exportTip: Select lists to include in the exported file. Export lists as CSV and PDF.
title: Title
refineTip: Refine and finalize your lists by using sketch tools to add or remove selected features.
refineTipNoSelections: There are no selections to refine. Go to My lists to create a list of features.
duplicatesTip: Duplicate features are always removed. When enabled, pop-ups from each layer will be compared and any duplicate pop-up information will be removed.
